title: ActiGraph
description: Specializing in cutting-edge clinical trial technologies, this company offers an extensive suite of solutions including AI-driven tools, virtual monitoring, and medical-grade wearable sensors to optimize trial efficiency and participant data insights.

children.value: Specializing in cutting-edge clinical trial technologies, this company offers an extensive suite of solutions including AI-driven tools, virtual monitoring, and medical-grade wearable sensors to optimize trial efficiency and participant data insights.
